s.l: The same way the waves reaches the pebbled shore,
Our time speeds up to an end,
Every place that changes to before,
fights for it in tiring work.
the birth of Jesus Christ was in the centre of light,
Because he was mature as an infant for which he was praised.
He was defeteddefeated deceitfully in his glory fight,
And the tie he was gifted does confuse him now.
Time breaks through the flowering time of the youth
And it searches for the parallels in beauty's expression;
It feeds the rarities of the truth of nature,
but nothing is left but to scythe down.
But still I hope my verses will maintain,
to praise your worth even though his cruel actions.
